import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; export const AddNewAddress = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) const [address, setAddress] = useState({ u_id: user._id, name: "", mobile: "", pin: "", house: "", town: "", city: "", state: "", save_as: "", default: "" }) const inputChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setAddress((prev) => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } useEffect(() => { console.log(address) },[address]) return ( <>
Contact Details
Address
Save Address As
Home Work
setAddress((prev) => ({ ...prev, default: e.target.checked }))} />
); };
